tool_description: This api will give currency for give country name , if country name is not given it will give the curriencies for all the countries.
name: currency api
title: currency api

api_list.name: https://fbdvuusphdcpavnwdnjd.supabase.co/functions/v1/get-currency-info
api_list.description: This is the endpoint which will give the results
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-api8.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-api8.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
